name: positron-svn
description: Integrated Subversion source control with Positron IDE support. Privacy-focused: zero telemetry, local-only operations.

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && if [ "$CI" = "true" ]; then npm run test:e2e; fi

_comment_security: Known dev-only vulnerability: glob@10.4.5 in npm@10.9.4 (transitive via @semantic-release/npm@12.0.2). This is a dev dependency only, vulnerability is in glob CLI --cmd flag (we use library API). Production dependencies have 0 vulnerabilities. Risk: LOW. See docs/SECURITY_NOTES.md for details.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Choose which folders and files to download from the repository.

Expand folders to browse server contents. De-emphasized items are on the server but not downloaded locally.

[Refresh](command:svn.sparse.refresh)

commands.title: Open WC version of a file

editor/title.when: config.svn.enabled && svnOpenRepositoryCount != 0 && isInDiffEditor && resourceScheme != extension && resourceScheme != merge-conflicts.conflicts-diff

enumDescriptions: System keyring locally, extension storage remotely (recommended for Windows + SSH)
Use native credential stores everywhere (Windows auth, gnome-keyring, macOS Keychain)
Use VS Code SecretStorage everywhere (isolated, works in all environments)
No credential storage, always prompt for credentials
svn.auth.credentialMode.description: How SVN credentials are stored and retrieved.

svn.auth.commandTimeout.description: Timeout in seconds for SVN commands. Increase for slow remote connections.

enumDescriptions: Log auth mode once at startup (recommended)
Log auth mode with every SVN command (verbose)
svn.output.authLogging.description: How often to log authentication mode in SVN output panel.

svn.performance.maxXmlTags.description: Maximum XML tags to parse (increase for very large repos with 100k+ files). Set to 0 for unlimited.

svn.blame.dateFormat.description: Date format for blame annotations (relative: '2 days ago', absolute: '2025-11-18')

svn.blame.enableLogs.description: Fetch commit messages for blame (disabling speeds up blame significantly)

svn.blame.largeFileLimit.description: Maximum number of lines before warning about large file (0 to disable)

svn.blame.largeFileWarning.description: Show warning before blaming large files

svn.blame.showWorkingCopyChanges.description: Show uncommitted changes in blame view

svn.blame.statusBar.enabled.description: Show blame information in status bar

svn.blame.gutter.enabled.description: Show blame annotations in editor gutter

svn.blame.gutter.showText.description: Show text annotations in gutter (author, revision, date)

svn.blame.gutter.showIcons.description: Show colored revision indicators in gutter (left of line numbers)

svn.blame.inline.enabled.description: Show inline blame annotations at end of each line (GitLens-style)

svn.blame.inline.showMessage.description: Fetch and show commit messages in inline annotations (slower)

svn.blame.inline.opacity.description: Opacity of inline blame annotations (0.0 to 1.0, default: 0.5)

svn.blame.inline.currentLineOnly.description: Show inline blame only for current line (cursor position)

svn.sparse.confirmExclude.description: Show confirmation dialog before removing items from disk

svn.sparse.largeFileWarningMb.description: Warn before downloading files larger than this size (in MB). Set to 0 to disable.

svn.sparse.downloadTimeoutMinutes.description: Timeout for download operations in minutes. Large folders may need longer timeouts.

svn.sparse.preScanTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout for folder pre-scan in seconds. Pre-scan counts files for progress display.

svn.commit.changes.selectedAll.description: Select all files when commit changes

svn.conflicts.autoResolve.description: Set file to status resolved after fix conflicts

svn.default.encoding.description: Encoding of svn output if the output is not utf-8. When this parameter is null, the encoding is automatically detected. Example: 'windows-1252'.

svn.defaultCheckoutDirectory.description: The default location to checkout a svn repository.

svn.delete.actionForDeletedFiles.description: When a file is deleted, what SVN should do? `none` - Do nothing, `prompt` - Ask the action, `remove` - automatically remove from SVN

svn.detectExternals.description: Controls whether to automatically detect svn externals.

svn.debug.disableSanitization.markdownDescription: **⚠️ WARNING**: Disable error message sanitization for debugging. When enabled, raw file paths and credentials will be visible in logs. **Only enable temporarily for troubleshooting, then disable immediately.**

svn.detectIgnored.description: Controls whether to automatically detect svn on ignored folders.

svn.diff.withHead.description: Show diff changes using latest revision in the repository. Set false to use latest revision in local folder

svn.diff.tool.description: Path to external diff tool (e.g., 'C:\\Program Files\\Beyond Compare 5\\BCompare.exe'). Command uses svn diff --diff-cmd.

svn.ignoreMissingSvnWarning.description: Ignores the warning when SVN is missing

svn.ignoreRepositories.description: List of SVN repositories to ignore.

svn.ignoreWorkingCopyIsTooOld.description: Ignores the warning when working copy is too old

svn.layout.branchesRegex.description: Regex to detect path for 'branches' in SVN URL, 'null' to disable. Subpath use 'branches/[^/]+/([^/]+)(/.*)?' (Ex.: 'branches/...', 'versions/...')

svn.layout.branchesRegexName.description: Regex group position for name of branch

svn.layout.showFullName.description: Set true to show 'branches/<name>' and false to show only '<name>'

svn.layout.tagRegexName.description: Regex group position for name of tag

svn.layout.tagsRegex.description: Regex to detect path for 'tags' in SVN URL, 'null' to disable. Subpath use 'tags/[^/]+/([^/]+)(/.*)?'. (Ex.: 'tags/...', 'stamps/...')

svn.layout.trunkRegex.description: Regex to detect path for 'trunk' in SVN URL, 'null' to disable. (Ex.: '(trunk)', '(main)')

svn.layout.trunkRegexName.description: Regex group position for name of trunk

svn.log.length.description: Number of commit messages to log

svn.log.authorColors.description: Show colored dots for commit authors in history view (helps distinguish authors visually)

svn.multipleFolders.depth.description: Maximum depth to find subfolders using SVN

svn.multipleFolders.enabled.description: Allow to find subfolders using SVN

svn.previousCommitsUser.description: Only show previous commits for a given user. Requires svn >= 1.8

svn.refresh.remoteChanges.description: Refresh remote changes on refresh command

svn.remoteChanges.checkFrequency.description: Set the interval in seconds to check changed files on remote repository and show in statusbar. 0 to disable

svn.showOutput.description: Show the output window when the extension starts

svn.showUpdateMessage.description: Show the update message when update is run

svn.sourceControl.changesLeftClick.description: Set left click functionality on changes resource state

svn.sourceControl.combineExternalIfSameS.description: Combine the svn external in the main if is from the same server.

svn.sourceControl.countUnversioned.description: Allow to count unversioned files in status count

svn.sourceControl.hideUnversioned.description: Hide unversioned files in Source Control UI

svn.sourceControl.ignore.description: Ignore unversioned files like .gitignore, Configuring this will overlook the default ignore rule

svn.sourceControl.ignoreOnStatusCount.description: Changelists to ignore on status count

svn.update.ignoreExternals.description: Set to ignore externals definitions on update (add --ignore-externals)
